languages.text: {n}На Пощаду снисходит странное спокойствие. Столкнувшись лицом к лицу с фактами, которые не может изменить, он, похоже, просто решил не утруждать себя эмоциями на их счет.{/n}
{n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На Пощаду снисходит странное спокойствие. Столкнувшись лицом к лицу с фактами, которые не может изменить, он, похоже, просто решил не утруждать себя эмоциями на их счет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}

{n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}
{n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}悯慈的脸上露出了古怪而平和的表情。他已经接受了这无可改变的事实，似乎也不打算再为这件事情烦恼了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}悯慈的脸上露出了古怪而平和的表情。他已经接受了这无可改变的事实，似乎也不打算再为这件事情烦恼了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マーシーに不思議な落ち着きが訪れる。変えようのない事実を前にして、彼はただ、この問題についてあれこれと思い悩まないことを決めたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マーシーに不思議な落ち着きが訪れる。変えようのない事実を前にして、彼はただ、この問題についてあれこれと思い悩まないことを決めたようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una extraña calma se apodera de Mercy. Al enfrentarse a hechos que no puede cambiar, parece que ha decidido no preocuparse por sus sentimientos al respecto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una extraña calma se apodera de Mercy. Al enfrentarse a hechos que no puede cambiar, parece que ha decidido no preocuparse por sus sentimientos al respecto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un calme étrange s'empare de Mercy. Face à des faits auxquels il ne peut rien, il semble avoir tout simplement choisi de ne pas s'en préoccuper.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un calme étrange s'empare de Mercy. Face à des faits auxquels il ne peut rien, il semble avoir tout simplement choisi de ne pas s'en préoccuper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine seltsame Ruhe überkommt Mercy. Angesichts der geschaffenen Tatsachen und weil er daran nichts mehr ändern kann, hat er offenbar beschlossen, dass ihm die Sache völlig gleichgültig ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine seltsame Ruhe überkommt Mercy. Angesichts der geschaffenen Tatsachen und weil er daran nichts mehr ändern kann, hat er offenbar beschlossen, dass ihm die Sache völlig gleichgültig ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Merhamet'e tuhaf bir sakinlik çöküyor. Değiştiremeyeceği gerçeklerle yüzleşmesinin ardından bu konuda hiçbir şey hissetmemeye karar vermiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange calm comes over Mercy. Faced with facts he cannot change, it seems he has simply decided not to trouble himself with any feelings on the matter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Merhamet'e tuhaf bir sakinlik çöküyor. Değiştiremeyeceği gerçeklerle yüzleşmesinin ardından, bu konu hakkında herhangi bir şey hissetmemeye karar vermiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
